title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 351.5 - Method of computing binaural percentage of loss of hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 351.5 - Method of computing binaural percentage of loss of hearing

State Regulations

In computing the percentage of hearing impairment, the
binaural method of evaluation should be used. The percentage of impairment in
the better ear should be multiplied by five. The resulting figure is added to
the percentage of impairment in the poorer ear and the result divided by six. The final percentage represents the binaural evaluation of hearing
impairment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12

351.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
